author: willybsm
post_text: December 7, 2015 at 2:52 PM#1HiI try to change the syntax by Store option Preset Type Default but fashion is not working?My command :Assign Root "Userprofiles".$"USERPROFILE"."StoreDefaults"."PresetDefaults" /MODE=PRESET TYPE DEFAULTI have tried on :Preset Type defaultPresetTypeDefaultetc.. without successWith this number also appears incomplete, 0 = Selective; 1 = GlobalIf I try 2 it does not work too many, so it seems impossible to call Universal and Preset Type Default by numberthanks for your help
title: Syntax mode Store option
